sense.name: representatives
sense.commentary: deputation, commission, delegacy, mission a group of representatives, or delegates
sense.examples: The delegation decided to ban the sale of alcohol. The delegation from Ireland was invited to join the President for tea. Several members of the delegation decided to crash the party.

sense.name: regulation
sense.commentary: DELEGATION[+event] delegating, relegating, relegation, deputation authorizing subordinates to make certain decisions
sense.examples: Delegation is one of the most important management skills. The delegation tasks must be agreed upon by the whole office.
